treatments.overview: A multipurpose healing ointment that creates a protective barrier to help heal and protect dry, cracked, or irritated skin. This non-greasy formula absorbs quickly while providing long-lasting moisture and barrier protection.
treatments.ingredients: Petrolatum, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Carbomer, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Dipotassium Phosphate, Tocopher
treatments.howTo:
Apply generous amount after serums
Massage gently until absorbed
Use nightly for intensive barrier repair
treatments.whyEffective: Contains petrolatum, ceramides, and hyaluronic acid to create a protective barrier while repairing damaged skin.

treatments.overview: A rich, peptide-infused moisturizer that helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while strengthening the skin barrier. This anti-aging treatment combines multiple peptides with hydrating ingredients for firmer, smoother skin.
treatments.ingredients: Water (Aqua/Eau), Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Copper Tripeptide-1, Sodium Hyaluronate, Allantoin, Carbomer, Polysorbate 20, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin
treatments.howTo:
Apply moderate amount after serums
Pat and massage until fully absorbed
Use 4-5x per week or as needed
treatments.whyEffective: Peptides stimulate collagen production while strengthening the skin barrier and reducing signs of aging.

treatments.overview: An overnight sleeping mask that delivers intense hydration while you sleep. This lightweight, gel-based formula helps restore your skin's moisture barrier overnight, leaving you with plump, dewy skin by morning.
treatments.ingredients: Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Trehalose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Beta-Glucan, Hunza Apricot Extract, Evening Primrose Root Extract, Sleepscentâ„¢ (Orange Flower, Rose, Sandalwood), Ceramide NP
treatments.howTo:
Apply thin layer as final PM step
Pat gently until absorbed
Use 3-4x per week to avoid over-moisturizing
treatments.whyEffective: Lightweight gel formula delivers intensive overnight hydration and barrier repair without clogging pores.

treatments.overview: A hybrid balm-gel moisturizer that provides customizable hydration for combination skin. This unique formula allows you to apply more to dry areas and less to oily zones, making it perfect for mixed skin types.
treatments.ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), 1,2-Hexanediol, Ceramide NP, Ceramide NS, Ceramide AS, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin
treatments.howTo:
Apply more to dry areas
Use lighter amount on oily zones
Pat gently and use 4-5x per week
treatments.whyEffective: Ceramide-rich formula balances different skin zones while strengthening the overall barrier function.

treatments.overview: A fast-acting spot treatment that targets individual blemishes with 2.5% benzoyl peroxide. This targeted acne treatment works to clear breakouts quickly while being gentle enough for sensitive skin with its micronized formula.
treatments.ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Benzoyl Peroxide 2.5%, Propylene Glycol, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA
treatments.howTo:
Apply small amount directly to active blemishes
Start every other night to build tolerance
Use PM only to avoid sun sensitivity
treatments.whyEffective: Benzoyl peroxide kills acne-causing bacteria and reduces inflammation while micronized formula minimizes irritation.
